DOC.brief_title: Pilot Evaluation New Galyfilcon A Contact Lens Compared Marketed Galyfilcon A Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: The subject must least 18 year age 39 year age . The subject current spherical soft contact lens wearer ( define minimum 6 hour daily wear ( DW ) minimum 1 month prior study ) willing wear study lenses daily wear basis ( define minimum 6 hour wear per day least five day week ) duration study . The subject 's optimal vertexed spherical equivalent distance correction must 1.00 9.00D . Any cylinder power must â‰¤ 0.75D . The subject must visual acuity best correctable 20/25+3 good eye . The subject must read sign Statement Informed Consent . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . Ocular systemic allergy disease might interfere contact lens wear . Systemic disease use medication might interfere contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . Clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality bulbar injection might interfere contact lens wear . Any ocular infection . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Pregnancy lactation . Diabetes . Infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) . Habitual contact lens type toric , multifocal , worn extend wear .
